name: John FLADGER, Appellant v. PENNSYLVANIA DEPARTMENT OF CORRECTIONS; Records Supervisor, Joseph Chiumento at S.C.I. Waymart, Appellees
name_abbreviation: Fladger v. Pennsylvania Department of Corrections

parties: John FLADGER, Appellant v. PENNSYLVANIA DEPARTMENT OF CORRECTIONS; Records Supervisor, Joseph Chiumento at S.C.I. Waymart, Appellees.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 23rd day of June, 2006, the above appeal is quashed for failure to file a brief.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
901 A.2d 982
John FLADGER, Appellant v. PENNSYLVANIA DEPARTMENT OF CORRECTIONS; Records Supervisor, Joseph Chiumento at S.C.I. Waymart, Appellees.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
June 23, 2006.
